title: (x) Fresh Gourmet soft script - various alternatives {Mikey D}
content:
Hi Guys:

I’m pretty sure this is a custom job, but perhaps someone knows a similar font to use instead...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211237im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FreshGourmet_5335.jpg)

I’ll be around, thanks in advance...

Q™ Says: It’s All About The Fonts!!!

 [‹ (x) hand drawn 3D sans from Kinetic, similar to Blockhead - Scrib {Ignacio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211237/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32786 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Assortment" heavy face w/ tiny serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211237/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32930 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Quesito

comments.content:
[http://www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/sep2006\_a/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211237/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/sep2006_a/ "http://www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/sep2006\_a/")

have a look here for similar looking fonts!!!

SuperUltraFabulous:

Thanks for the info, I didn’t have La Salle (wich I think it’s great!!) so, I used LHF Sarah Script, I think this is a great font too...

Thanks anyway...
